    makeOffer(Card, Card, PlayerRouter) - Method in class JEST.model.Player
    The REAL player makes his Offer : it retrieves 2 OfferCard (a face-up or face down Card and creates the player's offer.

    makeOffer(VirtualPlayer, Card, Card) - Method in class JEST.model.virtualPlayer.RandomStrategy
